reviews.text: We stumbled on this restaurant right near the Fairfield Hotel where we were staying and were SO glad we spotted it.  In my experience, restaurants in strip...
Delicious Indian food with a fine dining experience and Indian music adding to the ambience. Split the chicken tikka masala which comes with rice, an order...
Service was great and the food was awesome. I had Tandoori Chicken and the flavor was spectacular. Just the right amount of chicken and vegetables.
